column5: Heading up to Lewiston, NY to fish for Steelhead - any action in river? Or do I need to go out on Lake Ontario? Any other species active?Methods?
Heading up to Lewiston, NY to fish for Steelhead - any action in river? Or do I need to go out on Lake Ontario? Any other species active?Methods?
They are in the river right now. Come on down and have a blast. Also lots of lakers and browns around. Lewiston is a great place to fish. Let us know how you make out.
They are in the river right now. Come on down and have a blast. Also lots of lakers and browns around. Lewiston is a great place to fish. Let us know how you make out.
Go to www.niagarafishing.net for up to the minute info. Tell them bigfish1965 sent ya!
Thanks for the reply - leaving tonight about midnight.Any last minute tips would be appreciated.Thanks in advance for your helpI will post results upon returning.
